original_text: One of these men was called Agabus. The Holy Spirit gave him a message from God. He stood up and he said to the people there, ‘Soon people will be very hungry all over the world because there will be no food.’ (That happened when Claudius ruled the Roman world.)
korean_text: 그 중에 아가보라 하는 한 사람이 일어나 성령으로 말하되 천하에 큰 흉년이 들리라 하더니 글라우디오 때에 그렇게 되니라

sentences.original_text: One of these men was called Agabus.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들 중 한 사람은 아가보라 불렸다.

sentences.original_text: The Holy Spirit gave him a message from God.
and he said to the people there,
Soon people will be very hungry all over the world
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 온 세상 사람들이 매우 배고플 것이다.

sentences.original_text: because there will be no food.
That happened when Claudius ruled the Roman world.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 클라우디우스가 로마 세계를 다스릴 때 일어났다.
